SUMMARY: The Rhode Island National Guard held their promotion ceremony on Saturday at the Joint Force headquarters. At the ceremony, Sharon Harmon attained the rank of colonel.

SUMMARY: Travis McMichael, the gunman and the first of three men convicted of chasing and killing Ahmaud Arbery in a Georgia neighborhood in 2020 was sentenced to life in prison.

TITLE: Minnesota jury sides with pharmacist who refused to fill contraception prescription due to religious views
SUMMARY: A Minnesota jury determined that pharmacist George Badeaux did not illegally discriminate against a woman by not filling her contraception prescription due to his beliefs.

TITLE: Kansas splash pad linked to dozens of gastrointestinal illnesses, CDC says
SUMMARY: Health officials said dozens of people who visited Tanganyika Wildlife Park in Goddard, Kansas, last year suffered gastrointestinal illnesses linked to the park's splash pad.

TITLE: New Jersey man who was sentenced to six decades in prison will have new trial following appeal
SUMMARY: An NJ man who was convicted of stabbing his girlfriend to death in 2011 is having a new trial after appealing the ruling. Jurors convicted him after just 45 minutes in his last trial.

TITLE: Delaware Memorial Bridge construction expected to cause delays
SUMMARY: Traffic delays are expected due to construction of the Delaware memorial Bridge. Two lanes of the Delaware side of the bridge will be closed to traffic in the first phase.

TITLE: 9-year-old Baltimore boy allegedly kills 15-year-old girl in shooting, police say
SUMMARY: 15-year-old Nykayia Strawder was shot and killed in Baltimore after a 9-year-old boy fired a gun at her head Saturday. Relatives say the boy had fought with her brother.
